content: rib­a­roni hat by jane tanner rib­a­roni hat v 2 by jane tanner © 2007 2008 2013 page 1 sizes to fit head circumference baby 15­16 child 17­18 small 19­20 medium 21­22 large 23+ a note about fit i would recommend the child size for ages 2­4 and small size for ages 5­8 however kids head size measurements can be much larger than this when in doubt make a bigger size abbreviations p2tog­tbl purl 2 together through the back loops feel free to substitute it with a regular p2tog it will still work and look fine modification if you would like to add a stripe work approximately 2 before switching colors materials 1 1 5 1 75 2 2 5 oz worsted weight yarn 0 1­0 2 oz of contrasting color optional size 7 needles 16 circular needle and double point needles or your choice of circular needles 4 stitch markers gauge 4 75 sts/1 in stockinette stitch directions cast on 64 72 80 88 96 sts loosely join being careful not to twist and place marker establish rib pattern for size each size has its own distinct rib pattern baby *k4 p1 k2 p1;* repeat 7 more times child *k4 p1 k3 p1;* repeat 7 more times small *k4 p1 k4 p1;* repeat 7 more times medium *k4 p1 k2 p1 k2 p1;* repeat 7 more times large *k4 p1 k2 p2 k2 p1;* repeat 7 more times for baby child and small sizes work rib pattern for 4 5 5 5 inches from cast on skip ahead to set up round for crown shaping for medium and large sizes only work rib pattern for 1 5 inches from cast on then change to the following pattern medium *k4 p1 k5 p1;* repeat 7 more times large *k4 p1 k6 p1;* repeat 7 more times work pattern until hat measures 6 6 5 inches total from cast on continue to crown set up for all sizes set up round for crown shaping at beginning of round remove marker k2 replace first marker; this is the new location for the beginning of rounds *work in rib pattern for 16 18 20 22 24 sts place marker;* repeat two more times for third and fourth markers then work to the end of the round in established rib ending with a k2 the stitches should be evenly divided between the 4 markers 16 18 20 22 24 sts between each rib­a­roni hat v 2 by jane tanner © 2007 2008 2013 page 2 crown shaping rounds 9­18 for baby 7­18 for child 5­18 for small 3­18 for medium 1­18 for large for large size only round 1 decrease *k2 p2tog­tbl k5 p1 k4 p1 k5 p2tog k2;* repeat 3 more times 88 sts round 2 *k2 p1 k5 p1 k4 p1 k5 p1 k2;* repeat 3 more times for medium and large only round 3 decrease *k2 p2tog­tbl k4 p1 k4 p1 k4 p2tog k2;* repeat 3 more times 80 sts round 4
